title: Roseate plans to add two hotels every year through management agreements
description: Roseate Hotels & Resorts, owned by Bird Group, plans to increase its two hotels per annum through management agreements. The company also aims to develop luxury boutique hotels in India and abroad. Roseate Hotels & Resorts is planning to include coworking centers at hotels in metro cities, while its properties in tourist destinations will be developed into resorts.
